product_info.title: ZQ600 PLUS-HC MOBILE PRINTERS
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZQ600 PLUS-HC MOBILE PRINTERS
ZQ600 Plus-HC Mobile Printers
Easily reduce the risk of errors in specimen collection with premium
mobile printing at the point of care
Want to improve specimen labeling accuracy, staff productivity and patient safety? With the ZQ600 Plus Healthcare Series, you can.
The ZQ600 Plus takes Zebra’s popular QLn platform and makes it even better—adding advanced technology and innovative design
that drive productivity, ease-of-use and manageability to a new level. Designed specifically for healthcare, these compact printers are
built to withstand constant disinfecting. The color display takes all the guesswork out of printer status. Advanced battery technology
powers every minute of the longest shift. The ZQ600 Plus offers fast, dependable wireless connections and your IT department will
find the ZQ600 Plus easier to integrate, manage and secure, thanks to Zebra’s powerful Print DNA™ suite of applications, utilities and
developer tools.
Industry-Standard 802.11r Fast Roaming for Seamless Access
Support for 802.11r fast roaming technology delivers the
dependable wireless connection your on-the-move staff needs.
Instant Wake-Up Over Wi-Fi
Every second counts in the mission-critical world of
healthcare— that’s why the ZQ600 Plus offers instant wake on
Wi-Fi. This intelligent printer enters sleep mode when it is idle,
and automatically wakes up the moment a user sends a print
job, delivering instant availability—along with maximum
battery cycle time. And the ZQ600 Plus’ instant wake-up works
over both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.
Large Color Display Makes Configuration and Operation a
Premium Features for Maximum Snap
It’s easy to set up and maintain the ZQ600 Plus Series with its
Productivity
large display, user-friendly interface and easily customized
menu. The display changes color when the printer is paused or
The Industry’s First Wi-Fi™ 6 Mobile Printer in an error state, such as out of media or latch open, so users
The ZQ600 Plus Series offers fast, dependable and secure instantly know what the printer needs to stay up and running.
wireless connections for your healthcare staff. Take advantage And since the ZQ600 Plus Series is based on Zebra’s Link-OS
of your Wi-Fi 6/6E network upgrade and get best-in-class menu system, you’ll get a common UI and user experience
WPA3 security, lightning-fast speeds and enhanced roaming. across other Zebra Link-OS mobile, desktop and industrial
For flexibility, choose between 802.11ax/Bluetooth™ 5.3 or printers to lower the learning curve.
802.11ac/Bluetooth 4.2 dual radio options, depending on your
network environment. Business Tough—Built for All-Day Every Day Use
While the ZQ600 Plus is lightweight and comfortable to wear
all shift long, it is loaded with features that give it long-lasting
durability, including over-molding, a tempered-glass display
and seamless one-piece design.
The ZQ600 Plus Healthcare Series—boost staff productivity and specimen labeling accuracy with the next
evolution in mobile printing.
For more information, please visit www.zebra.com/zq600-plus-hc-series
--- Page 2 ---
The high-grade resin is one of the toughest plastics available Now, the ZQ600 Plus Healthcare Series raises the bar again.
for greater impact resistance. And multiple mechanical design And since the ZQ600 Plus Series is backward compatible with
improvements further increase printer robust-ness and QLn accessories, you can upgrade to the latest platform and
uptime. ingenuity without buying new accessories or rebuilding the
settlement room.
Withstands Constant Disinfecting
The ZQ600 Plus Series is constructed using medical-grade, Comprehensive Remote Management
disinfectant-ready materials that can be safely cleaned Options
between each use to help prevent the spread of germs in
hospitals and clinics.
Resolve Problems Faster with the Ethernet Cradle
Superior Battery Power and Power Remote management is easy with the Ethernet Cradle. By
docking the printer in the cradle at the end of every shift, IT
Management
can remotely upgrade the firmware as needed to ensure that
each printer is operating at peak performance.
The Highest Battery Capacity in its Class
With the ZQ600 Plus Series’ high capacity battery, you can be Easily Manage All Your Printers—All From a Single Location
sure that every worker has plenty of power for every shift. Maintain secure and troubleshoot printers simply and easily,
from anywhere, at anytime. Use the free Printer Setup Utilities
Do more with Zebra’s Power Smart Print Technology™ to simplify setup and out-of-the-box configuration tasks. And
This patented Zebra technology maximizes efficiency by with the optional Printer Profile Manager Enterprise, you can
delivering the exact amount of power required for the highest manage one printer, a group of specific printers or all printers
quality printing. Printers with PSPT save an estimated 20 to 30 anywhere in the world.
percent of their battery power.
Seamless Integration with Your Device Management
Extraordinary Battery Management Capabilities System
The ZQ600 Plus Series’ PowerPrecision+ battery delivers the Get the simplicity of a single-pane-of-glass to manage all your
ultimate in battery power and management. A wealth of easily Zebra mobile devices and printers—including the ZQ600 Plus
accessible battery metrics makes it easier than ever to identify, Series. Easily integrate networked ZQ600 Plus Series printers
remove and replace aging batteries before they impact into your existing AirWatch or SOTI MobiControl device
productivity. management system. And if you are using Ivanti Avalanche
(powered by Wavelink), the ZQ600 Plus Series offers support
Advanced Platform Grows with Your for Avalanche right out of the box.
Business
Ensure Continued Reliability with Printhead Diagnostics
With the ZQ600 Plus Series, our unique Printhead Diagnostics
Print DNA, Your Printer’s Built-in Advantage provide visibility into the health of printheads across your
Durable printers are essential, but it’s the software inside that deployment.
will keep them in action. Zebra Print DNA is a suite of software
capabilities that gives you the ability to optimize printer Protect Sensitive Patient and Business Data with
performance over their entire lifecycle, even as your business PrintSecure
needs evolve. This complimentary Print DNA utility makes it easy to
configure over 30 settings to fine-tune printer security to
Robust Memory to Support Applications Today and protect your data.
Tomorrow
The ZQ600 Plus Series offers 256 MB RAM and 512 MB Maximize Uptime and Printer Visibility with Services
Flash—providing more than enough memory for all your fonts Ensure predictable performance and eliminate unbudgeted
and graphics needs today, as well as all the firmware upgrades repair expenses with Zebra OneCareᵀᴹ. You get unmatched
and new Print DNA tools for years to come. technical support direct from Zebra, as well as comprehensive
repair services, including accidental damage and defined
Backward Compatible with QLn Accessories repair turn-around times. And Zebra’s Visibility Services
With more than one million units sold, Zebra’s QLn Series set provide real-time insights to optimize utilization within your
the bar for accurate specimen labeling. workflows.
--- Page 3 ---
ZQ600 Plus Healthcare Series Accessories and Supplies
The ZQ600 Plus Healthcare Series offers all the accessories you need, from power and charging to carrying and
protection options, cables and more. For all the accessories available for the ZQ600 Plus Healthcare Series, please
refer to the Mobile Printer Accessory Guide, at www.zebra.com/mobile-printer-accessories
LITHIUM-ION CHARGING ACCESSORIES
ETHERNET CRADLE
Connect ZQ600/ZQ600 Plus printers to your wired Ethernet network via the ZQ600 Series
Ethernet Cradle to enable easy remote management—helping to ensure each printer is
operating optimally and ready for use. The Ethernet cradle can communicate over 10
Mbps or 100 Mbps networks using auto-sense.
The single-bay ZQ600 Series Ethernet cradle also charges the battery while it is in the
printer, while the 4-bay version (with optional wall mount kit) charges four printers at a
time. The 4-bay version includes an internal Ethernet switch and second Ethernet port, so
you can link and manage four 4-bay Ethernet cradles (a total of 16 printers) from one
port.
The printer remains fully functional so you can print while it is in either cradle. The
cradle’s LED lights indicate DC power and Ethernet-link status.
Remote printer management over your Ethernet allows:
• Battery management for monitoring battery health. Knowing each battery’s lifespan
Single-bay Ethernet
stage simplifies central management of your spare-battery pool.
Cradle
• Firmware management for updating printer firmware, eliminating the need for IT staff
and 4-bay Ethernet
to travel to the local user site, or for the printer to be sent back to a central location for
Cradle
updating.
• Print management for updating templates, fonts and graphics in order to print new
label formats.
• Device management for updating startup (e.g., config. sys), WML (front panel) or HTML
(browser) files to enhance or change configuration and status collection.
• Network management for updating encryption keys or certificate files to maintain the
highest level of security.
• Problem resolution and troubleshooting local printer issues that may otherwise require
the printer to be sent in for repair.
• Ability to manage Bluetooth printers, which traditionally have been off-network.
•
Unit with AC Adapter: Cradle, AC adapter, power cord and document CD including cradle
user manual and installation guide.
Cradle Unit: Cradle and document CD including cradle user manual and installation
guide (AC adapter can be purchased separately).
--- Page 4 ---
AC ADAPTER
Connect the IEC 60601-compliant AC adapter to your ZQ600/ZQ600 Plus printer and wall
outlet to charge the printer’s PowerPrecision+ battery while in the printer. The printer
can print labels and perform other functions during charging. Shown with printer for
reference purposes; printer is not included.
BATTERY CHARGERS
1-Slot Battery Charger: Docks and charges a single PowerPrecision+ Li-Ion printer
battery. Integrated power supply. Ships with line cord for your region.
3-Slot Battery Charger: Dock and charge up to three PowerPrecison+ Li-Ion printer
batteries at a time. The 3-slot battery charger ships with a power supply and line cord for
your region.
Dual 3-Slot Battery Charger with Y Cable Connection: Dock and charge up to six
PowerPrecision+ Li-Ion printer batteries at a time. The dual 3-slot battery charger ships
with a power supply, Y-Cable and country specific power cord. Requires the appropriate
line cord for your region
--- Page 5 ---
CARRYING STRAPS/CASES
Hand Strap: Allows the printer to be carried by hand.
Shoulder Strap: Allows the printer to be carried over the shoulder.
Soft Case: Add an extra layer of protection for harsh environments with a soft case. Case
provides openings for changing the media and batteries and all connectors are
accessible. Includes shoulder strap.
ZEBRA CERTIFIED SUPPLIES
LABELS
IQ Color Specimen Collection Label: Automate the identification of STAT specimens to
increase accuracy and improve efficiency with IQ Color specimen collection labels. No
need to remember to manually mark specimens with a red marker as STAT.
Standard Specimen Collection Label: Not ready to automate STAT identification yet,
Zebra offers standard specimen collection labels in paper and moisture resistant
polypropylene materials. These materials have been pre-tested by Zebra’s Supplies R&D
team in the ZQ600 and ZQ600 Plus to ensure high-quality, durable print to ensure
reliable identification to reduce the need for label reprinting and re-draws due to lack of
identification.
--- Page 6 ---
